price: Dan apa yang menimpa kamu pada hari bertemunya dua pasukan, maka (kekalahan) itu adalah dengan izin (takdir) Allah, dan agar Allah mengetahui siapa orang-orang yang beriman.
arabic: وَمَآ أَصَٰبَكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡجَمۡعَانِ فَبِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِيَعۡلَمَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā aṣābakum yawma al-taqā al-jamʿāni fabi-idh'ni al-lahi waliyaʿlama al-mu'minīna
